title: Structural Representations for Cross-Attack Generalization in AI Agent Threat Detection
summary: Autonomous AI agents executing multi-step tool sequences face semantic attacks that manifest in behavioral traces rather than isolated prompts. A critical challenge is cross-attack generalization: can detectors trained on known attack families recognize novel, unseen attack types?
